# GitHub Templates

This directory contains templates and workflows for the Crowd project.

## Contents

### Issue Templates

- **bug_report.md**: Template for reporting bugs
- **feature_request.md**: Template for requesting new features
- **config.yml**: Configuration for issue templates

### Pull Request Template

- **PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md**: Standard template for all pull requests

### Workflows

- **ci.yml**: Continuous Integration workflow that runs on push and pull requests
  - Type checking for server and mobile apps
  - Server build verification

## Using Templates

When creating a new issue or pull request, GitHub will automatically provide these templates. Simply fill out the relevant sections to help maintainers understand and process your contribution efficiently.

## Contributing

Please use these templates to maintain consistency across the project. If you have suggestions for improving these templates, feel free to open a pull request!
